website_summaries.verdict: The Cuisinart Deluxe convection toaster oven broiler offers nine functions, including convection for making cakes, potatoes and roasts.
pros: Can accommodate a whole chicken, a 12-inch pizza, or six slices of bread
Unit controlled by electronic dial and LED buttons
Non-stick interior makes cleaning your oven easy and hassle-free
Digital controls with clock and timer make operation simple
Adjustable thermostat temperatures range from 200-450 degrees for cooking and 500 F for broiling
Exact Heat sensor maintains precise oven temps, and the Always Even shade control ensure toast turns to selected shade
cons: Hard to remove grease from interior
Digital design with dial is cumbersome
Toast has to be positioned perfectly over heat element or only part of your toast will get toasted

customer_reviews.title: It replaced a Cuisinart oven that lasted for 7 years ...
customer_reviews.text: It replaced a Cuisinart oven that lasted for 7 years that was still working but getting very hard to clean. The replacement is a piece of junk. The button labels wore off in a few months. Then the convection fan quit. Last night it wouldn’t heat up to correct temperature. So, 9 months from purchase to trash. Never again with a Cuisinart, I can’t afford them!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbyflash

customer_reviews.title: Disappearing labels
customer_reviews.text: 3 months in - unit has worked well and cooks as expected. One negative - the labels are coming off the buttons. This will make it hard to use in the future. This is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: James L Fry

customer_reviews.title: Cusinart
customer_reviews.text: The writing on the toaster dials has already come off of the buttons. We've only used the toaster over 3 times so the dials should be holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: It seemed like a nice toaster oven when opened and used. But after 2 months of using it almost daily, the buttons wear off the writing. For the price I paid, this certainly shouldnt happen. What happened to the good ol days of quality appliances?? Tired of buying crap.
customer_reviews.author: K....

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is no help.
customer_reviews.text: The unit works great, but the letters on the command buttons come off with daily use. There are six commands, timer, temperature, and four others, which I can not read because the letters blur and then disappear. Contacted Cuisinart but they want to send me a new unit at my expense which seems like a waste of everything. They also said they had no reports like mine. I keep a very clean kitchen so I find it hard to believe mine is the first problem.
customer_reviews.author: Desert gal

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Blows away other toaster ovens we ever had. Worth spending more. Have made steaks, chops , and chicken in it..everything comes out perfect! Best feature of all is that when you select various cooking options (bake, broil etc) preset time and temperature display for that function. Although adjustable, the presets are perfect. Super easy to clean inside. Still looks new in there despite heavy usage. Relatively compact outside, but spacious inside. Buy it..you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Snakeman

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than what is stated in the description
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than what is stated in the description. Lack of proper trays to cook anything appropriately. Cooking pizza causes cheese to drip off right onto the electric coils causing massive amounts of smoke. First time I used it the smoke alarm went off. Not easy to clean. Electric cord is too short. Pay for the ones that are over $200.00. They are larger, better built, and have the appropriate cooking trays.
customer_reviews.author: badron1@optonline.net

customer_reviews.title: This is not a very good oven
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for the past 2 years and the LED display is already not working consistently, it resets itself all the time. I have to turn it off and then wait for it to rest and plug it in again to have it reset. I will not be purchasing any Cuisinart products moving forward.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Quiaoit

customer_reviews.title: My toaster oven was delivered in May 2017. It ...
customer_reviews.text: My toaster oven was delivered in May 2017. It is now August and I am now on my third. This model has an (known by Cuisinart) issue with lettering on the buttons. It rubs off so that you cannot read "shade", etc. Aside from that it does not toast evenly. All other functions seem to be "ok". For the money, I would look for a different model or brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: BEST APPLIANCE IN MY KITCHEN!
customer_reviews.text: Our toaster oven arrived faster than I expected. I had thought long and hard whether I needed another appliance on my counter but this is THE BEST appliance I've ever bought. I use it every day whether it's to make toast or to cook in. It toasts my English muffins better than any toaster. I've used it to bake in but caution because it takes LESS time to bake than a regular oven (and I have a top of the line oven in my kitchen). It grills, broils and in general this is by far the best appliance. I don't know how I could have done without it.
customer_reviews.author: Soula

customer_reviews.title: Meets Other 5-Star Reviews ~ NICE price & cooks Beautifully!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Purchase for a *Toaster-Oven*!! I out-used my previous name-brand toaster-oven over the years. This ONE Actually Produces a MUCH-HIGHER Quality (e.g. probably from the Convection-oven Feature!!) and is SOOO easy to use - digital display is user-friendly!! Definitely, take the wise-advice of previous reviewers to use Clear-Nail Polish on the buttons to preserve the quickly-touched-off labels (words)!!
customer_reviews.author: PinotNoirLand

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size for My Small Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I have been using my new convection oven/toaster almost every day. I live alone and most often have no need of using my big oven any more. I can heat up some fish-n-chips in just a few minutes, make a quickbread or pan of brownies, etc. It fits on my countertop without taking up a lot of space. It's easy to clean and so far I have not had any issue with the labels on the buttons fading, which some others have mentioned in their reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra J.

customer_reviews.title: The buttons have letters on the button end that dont ...
customer_reviews.text: The buttons have letters on the button end that dont last 7 months. Cuininart as a business does a lousy job of support. Buy another
customer_reviews.author: F. Mitch Treese

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster oven!
customer_reviews.text: Operationally it works great and takes up very little space, but it says it is white, when in fact only the door is white and the rest of it is stainless steel, which gives it an industrial look, and is ok since it matches my kitchen, but would have preferred solid white! So far it works very well and I really like it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cookininmo

customer_reviews.title: Advertised as new — but was not!
customer_reviews.text: Oven arrived wrapped in bubble wrap in a plain brown shipping box. There was no manufacturer's packaging or user guide included—this is clearly a used (or refurbished) unit. I double-checked my invoice, it was definitely advertised as new.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: A good compromise
customer_reviews.text: As far as functionality goes, this toaster oven works great. Even browning on toast, good at baking rolls, and reliably heats up to 450F with only minor temperature variation at the set temperature. The user interface isn't immediately intuitive, but once you know how it works, its easy. Adding more time requires a few button pushes, which I feel should have just been a knob turn when in operation, but not a big deal. The size is also nice - not too large on the counter top and sufficiently large inside to hold 4 slices of large bread. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Benken

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Glad that I chose this oven over the other options. Since receiving this, I haven't used my oven as much. Great for cooking a couple of pork chops, baked potatoes, small casseroles, reheating leftovers. Pizza tastes much better than reheating in the microwave. Took the toaster off the counter and use this for toast, bagels and frozen waffles. The only downside was that the lettering rubbed off of the buttons after a couple of months. But it was ok since I knew which buttons to push in what order. Would recommend this toaster/oven.
customer_reviews.author: jeml1013

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Good oven but the words wore off of the buttons after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia brignati

customer_reviews.title: Even heating
customer_reviews.text: We use our Cuisinart every other day. It preheats quickly and heats evenly. The timer and options are very helpful. I had to train myself to stop shutting it off because when jumping between options such as bake to time you would think you need to hit the start/stop but you do not. You just hit the option button again. We have had this for about a month and it works great and seems very sturdy. It has a short cord so you need to plan for it to work near an outlet.
customer_reviews.author: mags

customer_reviews.title: A Do-All Appliance!
customer_reviews.text: This nice-looking little "do all" appliance DOES do.it all. I doubt I will use the broiler feature because of probable clean-up efforts, but have baked pie crusts and mac & cheese, warmed up coffee cake and toasted bread and English muffins. The Cuisinart performed well in everything tried. I didn't want a black appliance on my white marble counter, and the Cuisinart solved that issue too.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula H. Medanich

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and well made
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for a week but so far so good. Did not get overly hot like some reviewers said. Looks good and well made, and roasted my first eggplant slices evenly, however the timer confused me -- I thought "2:00" meant 2 minutes but it was 2 hours! Luckily I checked it after 5 minutes before it burnt to a crisp! I took off one star for a somewhat confusing and not terribly intuitive cook setting and timer display. Also one hinge on the door catches ever slightly when closing. Not sure if this is on purpose so you can prop it slightly open or it's a glitch? Otherwise I'm happy with my choice so far!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Y

customer_reviews.title: Large enough for some real cooking. The troubling part ...
customer_reviews.text: Large enough for some real cooking. The troubling part is that the back gets dangerously hot when in use. Don't touch for sure, don't locate with back towards wood or other flammable surface, nor near a glass panel or window.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This little dynamo is simple but powerful. It heats up quickly, much faster than my old model. Being able to turn the fan on or off with the push of a button is nice too. The menu is pretty straightforward. The only thing that could be better would be better insulation, such as a double glass window (few toaster ovens have that).
customer_reviews.author: Donnaster

customer_reviews.title: I love this toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster oven. We replaced our previous toaster because it over took forever to heat and cook food. This one is larger, heats quickly and heats / toasts evenly. I also like the fact that it has a convection option - that speeds up the cooking time while providing a nice crisp to foods. I highly recommend this product. It is sleek and clean looking on my counter. And for the price, this is your best bet.
customer_reviews.author: Marie B.

customer_reviews.title: Basic, but calling it white is deceptive
customer_reviews.text: Picked this one because said it was white and we have all white countertops & appliances, the only thing white is the front. The sides are stainless steel and looks goofy in my kitchen. Other than that works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: For the most part I'm happy. Makes a great meatloaf heats up quickly
customer_reviews.text: For the most part I'm happy. Makes a great meatloaf heats up quickly. I am having a little trouble with baking if its a shallow pan 2 inch no problem, but if its a deeper 4 inch pan for making a loaf cake the top will burn before all the insides are cooked. I will experiment and try lower temperatures and lengthen times, but that's not what the recipes recommend. I will have to experiment more for me to get it right. Everything else looks good display, timers, temperature change in 5 degree increments all fine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy renewed! Spend the extra $$$, it's worth it, I promise!
customer_reviews.text: It's a long story. I ended up with a brand new one. You take a gamble when you buy renewed. Won't make that mistake again! The new one is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Roger's

customer_reviews.title: Not a good toaster
customer_reviews.text: This appliance should not have the word toaster in the description. It works good as an oven and not bad as a bagel toaster but doesn't make decent bread toast. Toasted wheat bread either is always under toasted or burnt. I have tried multiple settings with the same result. That is disappointing. The other complaint I have is that for an oven this size it gets quite hot. It needs more insulating material to reduce the heat transfer to the exterior of the oven. More insulation would more energy efficient as well. I like the baking and reheating features. It looks nice on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Lettering came off after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: Lettering came off after 3 uses. Cant find customer support number anywhere if you have issues. Toast kept coming out burn edges at 3 setting, really soggy on top and crispy on bottom with try on bottom level. Moved it to top and it no longer burnt edges but was not ideal either. It also took like 4 mins just to make two pieces of toast. I gave up and took my old toaster out. Ery upset about lettering. They need to provide a sticker set for issues like this. This is for a vacation rental and no one knows what button is for yet. Not so graceful.
customer_reviews.author: Maalika

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Design, Quick Heating, Good Capacity
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying using this toaster oven and have no real complaints. It is a bit less sturdy than I thought it would be but not a big problem. It heats up really quickly and cleans up easily. The capacity is fine for frozen pizza, etc. but a full sized muffin pan does not fit. I like the looks of it on my counter and am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carol S. Longo

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have found that a toaster oven is really a great appliance to have when you cook for one. It was becoming obvious that my previous oven would need to be replaced. I did some research and decided on the Cuisinart. It is a great oven. I like the size and the operation. Time will tell how well it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: project manager

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Among other things that have been hard to adjust to (temp cooks either too high or too low when toasting bread or bagels) the lettering on the buttons wore off immediately. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sacha Martinez

customer_reviews.title: MIne cheaply made and smoked when turned on
customer_reviews.text: While others have had no issues, mine unfortunately was typical of current Cuisinart products. Very cheaply made, poorly packaged, and smoked when I tried to preheat it. Brands like Breville which sells are much better and worth their prices.
customer_reviews.author: Randall P. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: This toaster oven exceeded my expectations! Once you find the selections that make your toast/bagel, whatever perfect, it is perfect every time! It even cooks cookies better than my big oven! (It is perfect in making 1 dozen cookies to mail to a relative in a nursing home in another state.) I could not be more pleased! I chose based on reviews, but searched in the criteria adding "white". It saved me from driving all over town and still not finding a white toaster oven.
customer_reviews.author: Kim H.

customer_reviews.title: Color is NOT Black
customer_reviews.text: The toaster oven is of typical Cuisinart high quality, but the color description and picture are inaccurate. The front color is not "black". It is dark grey and does not match any of the black appliances or counter top equipment in my kitchen. Not sure why they didn't paint it satin or gloss black, but I returned it due to color.
customer_reviews.author: BPH

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my TOB-195 which I had for a number of years. At least one other reviewer also did the same. I'm very happy with it. It took almost no time to figure how to use it with the easy button controls. I think I'll have this toaster oven for quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Haig

customer_reviews.title: Toasts well so far. The defaults are a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Toasts well so far. The defaults are a little too dark so I had to adjust. Read all the comments about the lettering coming off the buttons so I put clear tape over the buttons. Hopefully, that will work.
customer_reviews.author: A. Impastato

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for 3-4 months then started flashing "ERR" msg ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for 3-4 months then started flashing "ERR" msg. Have to unplug to reset it. After a few months even unplugging doesn't always resolve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: fanofdory

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. It can fit a small frozen pizza and casserole, and is not too large for my counter. It also toasts evening. Lastly, it preheats in minutes - ten times faster than a typical oven. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A.

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: We love the oven so far. As long as it holds up as well as the predecessor we'll be very happy with the purchase. So much quieter than the earlier version we purchased 15 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: GuruJon

customer_reviews.title: Hot and draws juice
customer_reviews.text: The unit has some very hot sides and needs a pretty good breaker (20 amps or better) or needs to be on its own 15Amp breaker)
customer_reviews.author: Michael Shear

customer_reviews.title: Good toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: We just received this a few days ago. We have toasted bread, reheated, and used convection. It all works as intended. It’s a bit less intuitive than some toaster ovens but I think we made the right choice. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: book lover

customer_reviews.title: Cuisinart toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: Don’t use a microwave, I use my toaster oven for reheating, baking and cooking whatever fits in it. (I have used an 8x8 glass pyrex dish) Since I use it the way I do, I want a safe and reliable appliance. Had very good luck with cuisinart.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Toaster/Convection Oven
customer_reviews.text: I use this appliance to toast, bake, broil, etc. I've had a number of toaster ovens over the years, and this beats them all. This one is also the best looking -- clean, compact. Others I've had were too big and ugly.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine L. Liddell

customer_reviews.title: counter oven
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for counter-looks great and does the job. Made wife happy!
customer_reviews.author: Earnest

customer_reviews.title: thought it would be oh so much better
customer_reviews.text: already the words on the front start are nearly all smudged off the rack positions do not allow for baking despite the adequate size of the inside the outside looks industrial and shop worn the good: there is no ticking with the timer. and the crumb tray is removabe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster and convection oven works well
customer_reviews.text: Great toaster and convection oven works well , although the ON-OFF button ink has already worn off to my disappointment
customer_reviews.author: David Coppola

customer_reviews.title: I like it alot
customer_reviews.text: I like it alot ! Im not sure how much better it is than a cheaper toaster oven but it looks great and it works like its supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: So far we love the Cuisinart TOB-135N Convection Toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: So far we love the Cuisinart TOB-135N Convection Toaster oven. I did brush on a little clear coat over the buttons we push every day. That seemed to be the only mark against the oven and it's an easy fix. This replaced an older Cuisinart that worked well for many years. This one is nicer looking and performs better than the older oven. All in all, very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B Alfery

customer_reviews.title: This Deluxe Convection Toaster is great. Once you get used to it
customer_reviews.text: This Deluxe Convection Toaster is great. Once you get used to it, it is very easy to use. Cooks 12 inch frozen pizza to perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and efficient in a small space.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this item a few weeks, but it has been easy to use and met my needs. It fits perfectly in my hotel room’s small kitchen area. I’ve toasted bread & bagels and have baked cookies and muffins in it. All have come out perfectly with the recommended oven temps. I’ve also baked chicken and finished t with the convection option to crisp the outsides a touch.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Great oven in a little package!
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster oven. Use to have one one twice as big. Wanted to downsize but didn't want to lose any of the functionality I love like toasting, broiling, roasting veggies, convection cooking, baking....this toaster oven does it all. Only gave had it a month but love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Smith

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: it does well. It cooks right. The temperature reads right. It say 350 it is 350 degrees. Just wish I could get a 9x13 pan in it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: That it very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift to a family member. She states it cleans up quickly, has many different options which she is still finding. Also very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: the lincoln queen

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: this is my second one. Had first one three years, was still working but was getting harder to clean baked on food
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Will complete your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This was a treat to myself. I'm retired, live alone in an apartment and don't cook much. This is a dream of an appliance all rolled into one. Add my crockpot and the kitchen is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good solid device that performs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Been using for months now without any concerns. Seems like a good solid device that performs as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toaster oven....the learning curve has been a little challenging, but once you get the hang of the settings, it is really easy
customer_reviews.author: B. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Has enough wattage to get the job done
customer_reviews.text: Cooks great. Digital function selector is more complicated than it should be , but once you get used choosing your options, it is good.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I need it to do
customer_reviews.text: This little oven is adorable and very efficient. I would not recommend using it as a toaster oven as it gets scary hot on the outside. I use this to cook and reheat food instead of using the big oven and it works perfectly and is super easy to clean....and did I mention adorable looking in the kitchen. It runs very quietly too.
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: A good product for any kitchen; easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.text: Like all of their products, I like the styling and ease of operation. It so useful for small reheating jobs, and unlike a microwave, will not toughen breads and meats. As a cook I also like it’s versatility and ease of cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette B. Davies

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with this Cuisinart
customer_reviews.text: We are delighted with our recent purchase. The unit we replaced alleged to have the convection feature, but it never worked well. This unit is reasonably compact, temperature reliable and has a wide range of functions (from toasting to broiling) that make it a very versatile counter top appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great as an oven and a toaster
customer_reviews.text: This oven works perfectly, even the toast setting. It does have a learning curve on where to place the internal rack but the owners manual provides excellent info. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: New oven!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one to replace the Cuisinart I had for years. This one is more difficult to operate. That is my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Beth P Dudley

customer_reviews.title: just right
customer_reviews.text: This is the most well designed counter top oven toaster ! I am so happy I picked it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: where there is smoke, there is fire
customer_reviews.text: The plug gets hot and when I toast there is smoke coming out. Too bad I cannot return this, bad move to buy a Cuisinart Toaster Oven
customer_reviews.author: LORI D.

customer_reviews.title: ... 50yr marriage and we both agree this is the best one. Our oldest son saw it and now ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had many toaster ovens in our 50yr marriage and we both agree this is the best one. Our oldest son saw it and now wants a new one since his broke. He'll love it when he gets it. Great features, nice compact look, just the best!!!
customer_reviews.author: Waterloo2

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Order received promptly. Item is compact & easy to clean. Toasts perfectly even - great for artisan breads which are longer and thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Memere78

customer_reviews.title: Love this toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster oven. Super simple to use, very intuitive and heats up quickly. Never thought I'd right a lovey dovey review for a toaster oven but... this one doesn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Boogwardo

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster over with convection.  Recommended highly!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this product. Toasts, bakes beautifully. The convection saves baking time. I will never own a regular toaster again. Never could find one that did the job correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Larson

customer_reviews.title: love it but doesn't fit a pizza
customer_reviews.text: SO far so good and love it! But it wouldn't fit a frozen pizza if you tried-you'd have to buy the next size up.

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: Put it in our pop up trailer, so far works great, toasts evenly and isn't too big. Looking forward to cooking more in it!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Jones Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Very easy to use! And i love the size
customer_reviews.author: armen hakobyan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister who has a household of 8 and everyone loves it. Perfect for tasting, warning leftovers, and the kids love using it to cook their pizza and other quick meals vs using the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: JPaul

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love my Cuisinart toaster oven. It’s versatile and easy to clean. It fits perfectly on my kitchen counter and I can use it more often than my conventional oven and save on my energy bills.
customer_reviews.author: Ian-William Fountain

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is the second oven of this model I have owned. I tried another model but same company and did not like it at all. So I realized the best thing to do was get one just like the one I had again. If I live long enough to need a new one I hope they are still selling this model.
customer_reviews.author: DLR

customer_reviews.title: Very Convenient and good for small kitchen 👍
customer_reviews.text: I love using my new oven toaster! Good for small. The food cooks really good and very convenient. Happy about the Cuisinart products.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndirella

customer_reviews.title: Great oven.
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond happy with this oven. I use it every day several times a day. Got rid of my toaster and my microwave. Yay! Has so many great features. The preset times are very reliable but easily adjusted. I’ve made everything from toast to cookies to a pot roast.
customer_reviews.author: Melli

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read screen
customer_reviews.text: Like the lcd screen and dial control. Easy to use. The outside can get very hot so be careful, Not as hot as some other brands. So far have used it to toast, reheat leftovers. French fries reheated with convection fan on worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster oven. Great buy after a lot of research.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita L Brousseau

customer_reviews.title: So far I'm pleased with the cooking but not so with the letters ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm pleased with the cooking but not so with the letters rubbing off. Something must be done about it by the company since so many have complained about this. I put scotch tape over the others before more rub off. I do like the compact size.
customer_reviews.author: Joan C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Toaster Oven
customer_reviews.text: So far, after 3 weeks, this product is excellent. It makes great toast, cookies bake perfectly, as do potatoes. Worth what I paid for it!
customer_reviews.author: Captain ET

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. I use it a couple times a week. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Oven Light
customer_reviews.text: A very vanilla product with just the bare minimum functionality. It doesn’t even have an oven light, something you just expect and don’t look for as an option.
customer_reviews.author: flying4fish

customer_reviews.title: Cuisinart Toaster Is Okay So Far
customer_reviews.text: Cuisinart Toaster going on 5 months and no complaints. Would have been nice if it had a light inside but it's not crucial. Hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: STACY

customer_reviews.title: Great little oven!
customer_reviews.text: It is just perfect for the space intended. I needed a toaster and a broiler. This oven exceeded all expectations. I have even cooked baby back ribs to perfection in this little oven. The fact that it came in white to match my other kitchen appliances sealed the deal.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC product. Highly recommended, especially if you have limited counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Karine Ben-dror

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I gave one to my daughter for Christmas and she was so happy with it that I decided to buy one for my self and now I know why she was so happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful oven just wished it was white all over
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful oven just wished it was white all over. Only the front is. All my appliances are white and my old Cuisinart was all white. The sides and top are stainless. Bakes great!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Easter

customer_reviews.title: It’s easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I would like it to be a bit wider to enable the use of larger baking vessels.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Oven has worked fine, however I am concerned about its quality (the ...
customer_reviews.text: Oven has worked fine, however I am concerned about its quality (the convection fan sounds weak at best- tinny), glad for the 3 year warranty!
customer_reviews.author: richard a. lesieur

customer_reviews.title: Best I ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. Saving for a backup. Love the convection feature. Perfect for two to four servings
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: it has worked perfectly since we received it, which ...
customer_reviews.text: it has worked perfectly since we received it, which is about a year ago. It does everything well and reaches temperature quickly.

customer_reviews.title: It's very tight to clean, the lettering on the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's very tight to clean, the lettering on the buttons came off after a few days of just wiping with water, but it works well.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It’s decent and easy to use. Somewhat pricey... but still good.

customer_reviews.title: Stop working in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one last December. It started showing ERROR last week and stopped working this week. I would be able to return it if I bought at local BestBuy.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the family on the go!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Love every function and feature! Looks beautiful on the counter and easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: it's amazing - truly the best
customer_reviews.text: it's amazing - truly the best. Except when capacity is an issue, you don't need a standard oven at all.

customer_reviews.title: As it says "Deluxe" toast oven!
customer_reviews.text: Especially like the bagel function, it works so well for toasting any kind of bread.

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth every penny. Highly recommended!

product_meta.title: Cuisinart TOB-135N Deluxe Convection Toaster Oven Broiler
product_meta.description: Color:Stainless SteelThe Cuisinart Deluxe convection toaster oven broiler is designed with 9 functions, including convection for making delicious cakes, potatoes and roasts. Sized to accommodate a whole chicken, a 12-Inch pizza, or 6 slices of bread, the unit is controlled by an electronic dial and LED buttons. The large Blue back-lit LCD allows for the quick and easy setting of function, temperature, and cook time. The exact heat sensor maintains precise oven temperatures, and the always even shade control ensures that toast consistently turns out the selected shade.
feature_bullets: 1. Spacious 0.6 cubic-foot capacity Fits 6 slices of bread or a 12" pizza
2. Digital controls allow you to set the temperature in increments of 25 degrees with large blue backlit display; 9 functions
3. Convection fan cooks food faster and more evenly

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars646 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
